#summary FreeBSD 7.0 Host Machine

= Introduction =

A FreeBSD 7.0 (REL) host machine is currently being used as a host machine.  This page documents some notes pertaining to it's setup and maintenance.


= Ports Maintenance =

== Updating Ports ==

This FreeBDSD handbook ports pages are comprehensive in explaining how to install, update and remove ports.

We use `portupgrade` to upgrade ports.  This is explained in the _4.5.4.2 Upgrading Ports using Portupgrade_ section.
